title: Modix Game Server Modules Schema
description: Schema for defining modules, their settings, and dependencies.

description.description: A brief description of the module.

mod_list.description: List of mods to load (example for Mods module).

backup_interval.description: Interval in hours for backups (example for Backups module).

report_interval.description: Interval in seconds for metrics reporting (example for Metrics module).

auto_update.description: Whether to automatically update mods (example for Mods module).

backup_location.description: Location for storing backups (example for Backups module).
